entry.title: 651 Equivalent Adhesive Vinyl (Styletech 4000) - BUNDLES of 44 colours
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tape Technologies
Type: Styletech ADH 651
Price: 35.00 - 63.85 (2 variants)

This listing is for bundles only..  If you are looking for rolls (1, 5 and 10 yards) or sheets, please consult the different listings.

BUY A BUNDLE AND AUTOMATICALLY SAVE 10% off the regular price. In these bundles, you get the full set of 43 colours and pay 40% less than Oracal 651 for an equivalent quality product.

3 MIL Intermediate Vinyl - up to 6 Year (.08 MM)Styletechtm V-4000 Series - A 651 equivalent permanent adhesive vinyl with savings of 30% on sheets and more as the sizes go up. 

The Styletech Series 4000 adhesive vinyl is a permanent intermediate vinyl available in 43 colours that is equivalent to Oracal 651 but at a fraction of the price. It is softer than other calendared products and provide you with the highest gloss available in the industry today. This vinyl has lower shrinkage and better color stability than other intermediate films resulting in up to 6 year durability in some colors.

entry.title: Beginner's Kits
entry.summary:
Vendor: SciptDesigns
Type:
Price: 38.70 - 70.00 (3 variants)

NOTE:  Pictures may not represent the exact content of the kit.  Please read description below.

Just starting out with this new hobby?  With the huge variety of products available, we thought we would make it easier for you to get going by offering you our beginner's kits along with a 10% saving from the original price of each separate item.

We have 3 different kits for you

Permanent adhesive vinyl (anything but walls!)  

In this kit you will get:

  • 1 Squeegee
  • 1 Styletech Transfer paper roll
  • 21 - 12x12 sheets in the following colours and product lines: Chrome Rose Gold; Opal White; FX Glitter Galaxy Black; Ultra Metallic Glitter Rose Gold, Melon; Transparent Glitter Holo; Polished Metal Silver; Etched Pearl; Textured Linen Champagne; Oracal 651 White, Black, Red, Yellow, Orange, Pink, Blue, Green, Cream, Brown, Grey, Lavender.

Non permanent adhesive vinyl (for walls)

In this kit you will get:

  • 1 Squeegee
  • 1 Styletech transfer paper roll
  • 20 - 12x12 sheets in the following colours : Beige; Black; White; Metallic Silver; Metallic Gold; Mint; King Blue; Geyser Blue; Powder Blue; Bubble Gum; Pink; Lilac; Grey; Red; Orange; Yellow; Brown; Marsh Green; Ivory aand Teal.

Heat transfer vinyl - Siser brand (for fabric)

In this kit you will get:

  • 1 Squeegee
  • Styletech Tool Set
  • 2 - 10x6 sheets of Glitter in Old Gold and Confetti Silver
  • 1 - 10x12 sheet of Holographic Sky
  • 1 - 15x12 sheet of Electric Teal
  • 1 - 15x12 sheet of Stretch Ballerina Pink
  • 7 - 15x12 sheets of regular HTV in the following colours: White, Black, Royal Blue, Red, Yellow, Green and Orange.
